Messages.Author: Ines Wolf
Messages.Content: Dear all, in case you are unable to join the meetings in person, you can join the meeting here. The link will be valid for all three sessions.  Please join in person if possible.  Meeting room: H7174 Time: 12:00 sharp until 14:00 https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/69373106089?pwd=ZHFyZ3dEV2lCcjhmRXBMQ0hSR2grQT09  Passcode 444777  Looking forward to seeing you tomorrow!

Messages.Author: Ines Wolf
Messages.Content: Dear all,  thank you for your participation in the thesis accelerator! I wish you all interesting research, smooth note-taking and writing, and a good summer semester. I have one final request: Some of you have already registered on Moses, thank you. For the remaining of you, please also register. I was informed that we need these numbers for reporting. You can register it as "Zusatzmodul".  If you DO NOT want it to appear on your final diploma, you can write a short request to your examination office team (for IMES students, this is team 5). - ib5@pruefungen.tu-berlin.de https://moseskonto.tu-berlin.de/moses/modultransfersystem/modulpruefung/anmeldungwizard.html?bolognamodul=7357  Thank you very much! Best regards, Ines

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Select your Method Concepts for 2nd Assignment

Messages.Author: Ines Wolf
Messages.Content: Dear all, I hope you had a good weekend! There is a survey acitivity posted in the "Assignment" block. Please select the "group" / methodolgy which you will prepare for the second assignment. You may complete this as a single assigment or complete this as a group of max. 3 students. https://isis.tu-berlin.de/mod/choicegroup/view.php?id=1822639 Please sign up by the end of this week, April 26th, for better time management - thank you! You may present during session 2 or session 3. Let me know if you have questions! Best, Ines  My email address: Ines.wolf@tu-berlin.de
